title: Encoding and Decoding JSON in Golang
description: This challenge aims to test your knowledge of encoding and decoding JSON data in Golang.

meta.title: JSON Encoding and Decoding in Golang | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to encode and decode JSON data in Golang programming language. Explore examples of basic and custom data types, and dive into the JSON package documentation.
meta.keywords: Golang, JSON, Encoding, Decoding, Programming Tutorials
